snippet.title: GO HEROES Prometheus - FIRST 20 MINUTES
snippet.description:
About the game - Explore the everlasting ancient Greek world. Steal the Fire of the Gods and fight mythical creatures, collect loot, and wield legendary weapons in a unique action-turn-based battle system that will encourage you to push forward at great speed through environmental puzzles in a mythological setting. My First impression : I just finished playing the demo and wanted to say that I had an amazing experience with it! Was a lot of fun, the combat was fair, the puzzles were not too easy but solvable... I liked it :) You can find more about the game here : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/happyland-games/go-heroes

#Chochklah #GoHeroes #Kickstarter #HAPPYLANDgames #Gameplay#
